publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1134.1 Tommy Sheridan: Pensioner Poverty in Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1134) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "to increase" to end and insert "to restore the earnings link with the state pension with immediate effect".

S1M-1134.1 Tommy Sheridan: Pensioner Poverty in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1134) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "to increase" to end and insert "to restore the earnings link with the state pension with immediate effect".

S1M-1134.1 Tommy Sheridan: Pensioner Poverty in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1134) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "to increase" to end and insert "to restore the earnings link with the state pension with immediate effect".

S1M-1134.1 Tommy Sheridan: Pensioner Poverty in Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1134) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "to increase" to end and insert "to restore the earnings link with the state pension with immediate effect".
S1M-1134.1 Pensioner Poverty in Scotland (lodged on 5 September 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-1134.1 Tommy Sheridan: Pensioner Poverty in Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1134) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "to increase" to end and insert "to restore the earnings link with the state pension with immediate effect". Supported by: Alex Neil
